metadata.name: Gold MallCard NFT
metadata.description:
Own a MallCard NFT for 'Mallconomy Partner' status and enjoy revenue sharing, passive income, brand rewards, store sale priorities, future launchpad & MallClub perks. 

Mallcard NFTs are front row seats to the Metaverse Shopping Mall experience, earning and the first opportunity to create your own store.

Check go.mallconomy.com/utility for your amazing perks.
